question: Which country has passed a ‘Bipartisan resolution’ on Autonomous Tibet?
explanation:
The US House of Representatives has recently passed a bipartisan resolution on Autonomous Tibet, recognising the cultural and religious significance of an autonomous Tibet.
The resolution also recognised the work done by the 14th Dalai Lama to promote global peace and harmony. It also calls to convene a bipartisan forum to discuss peaceful solutions to international conflicts.
